mapper.update: update CI_REMIND set REMIND_CONTEXT = #{remindContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMIND_TIME = #{remindTime,jdbcType=DATE}, REMIND_CONTRACTNO = #{remindContractno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMIND_SYSKEY = #{remindSyskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMIND_COLLECTOR = #{remindCollector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPOSE_TIME = #{disposeTime,jdbcType=DATE}, DISPOSE_CREATOR = #{disposeCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DISPOSE = #{isDispose,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_TIME = #{creatorTime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID_, REMIND_CONTEXT, REMIND_TIME, REMIND_CONTRACTNO, REMIND_SYSKEY, REMIND_COLLECTOR, DISPOSE_TIME, DISPOSE_CREATOR, IS_DISPOSE, CREATOR, CREATOR_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from CI_REMIND where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID_, REMIND_CONTEXT, REMIND_TIME, REMIND_CONTRACTNO, REMIND_SYSKEY, REMIND_COLLECTOR, DISPOSE_TIME, DISPOSE_CREATOR, IS_DISPOSE, CREATOR, CREATOR_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from CI_REMIND
